trans-unit.source: Provides 3-D to 2-D transformation support.
This class can transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Point> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Rect>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D> object.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Makes the instance a clone (deep copy) of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> using base (non-animated) property values.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CloneCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The object to clone.
Makes the instance a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> using current property values.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> to be cloned.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.CreateInstanceCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The new instance.
Makes the instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> using base (non-animated) property values.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.GetAsFrozenCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The instance to copy.
Makes the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> to copy and freeze.
Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.Transform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
The result of transforming point.
The transform did not succeed.
Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned bounding box that contains all of the points in the original 3-D bounding box.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.TransformBounds%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The 3-D bounding box to transform.
An axis-aligned bounding box that contains all of the points in the specified 3-D bounding box.
Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.
Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.TryTransform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
The result of transforming inPoint.
`true` if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, `false`.
